DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess safety tolerability intravenously ( i.v . ) administer 186 Rhenium-isotope ( 186Re ) -labelled bivatuzumab investigate biodistribution pharmacokinetics 186 Re-labelled bivatuzumab patient non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC )
DOC.brief_title: Biodistribution Study With 186 Re-labelled Humanised Monoclonal Antibody BIWA 4 Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients must histological cytological confirmation Non small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) stage I , II IIIa accord stag system American Joint Committee Cancer ( AJCC ) Patients destined resection tumour Patients 18 year age Patients young 80 year age Patients give 'written informed consent ' Patients life expectancy least 3 month Patients good performance status : Karnofsky > 60 Lifethreatening infection , allergic diathesis , organ failure ( bilirubin > 30µmol/l and/or creatinine > 150 µmol/l ) evidence recent myocardial infarction Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) unstable angina pectoris Premenopausal woman ( last menstruation < = 1 year prior study start ) Not surgically sterile ( hysterectomy , tubal ligation ) Not practice acceptable mean birth control , ( plan continue throughout study ) . Acceptable method birth control include oral , implantable injectable contraceptive Women positive serum pregnancy test baseline White blood cell count < 3000/mm³ , granulocyte count < 1500/mm³ platelet count < 100000/mm³ . Details prior chemotherapy radiotherapy know . Hematological disorder , congestive heart failure , bronchial asthma , alimentary contact allergy , severe atopy allergy
